channel.title: On Change with Petro du Pisani
channel.description: The podcast that explores 'change that works' and the people who make it happen.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Let's talk about change - with integrity.
channel.itunes:author: Petro Du Pisani
channel.itunes:summary: Experienced change practioner, Petro du Pisani, explores change that works - and the people who make it happen. Recorded and produced at Solid Gold Studios.

item.itunes:author: Petro Du Pisani | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: Change in a production environment | Tom Marsicano
item.itunes:subtitle: With guest Tom Marsicano from 'And Change'
item.description:
Petro du Pisani talks to 'And Change' owner, Tom Marsicano about change in a production environment.

Show notes are available at SolidGoldStudios.co.za/onchange
item.itunes:summary: Petro du Pisani talks to 'And Change' owner, Tom Marsicano about change in a production environment.
item.itunes:keywords: Tom Marsicano, And Change, change in a production environment, On Change, IntegriChange, Petro du Pisani, change, change implementation, Solid Gold Studios, another Solid Gold podcast, Gavin Kennedy
